notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: D.Z. performed the analysis and produced the first version of the manuscript. P.C and G.K. provided advice and discussion throughout the process. F.M. and A.J. helped with the development for the SOC-thermic coupling in the ORCHIDEE-MICT model. G.H. contributed to analyses of soil C data sets and the discussion. All authors contributed to the writing of the manuscript.
